nl.weeaboo.vn.render

Interface IRenderEnv

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface IRenderEnv
extends java.io.Serializable
    Exposes properties of the main render target (screen size, etc.)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getGLClip

        nl.weeaboo.common.Rect getGLClip()
        Returns:
        The OpenGL clipping rectangle for the virtual screen.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns:
        The virtual width of the screen.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns:
        The virtual height of the screen.

      • getVirtualSize

        nl.weeaboo.common.Dim getVirtualSize()
        Returns:
        The virtual size of the screen.

      • getRealClip

        nl.weeaboo.common.Rect getRealClip()
        Returns:
        The render area in physical screen pixels.

      • getScreenSize

        nl.weeaboo.common.Dim getScreenSize()
        Returns:
        The dimensions of the physical window in screen pixels.

      • getScale

        double getScale()
        Returns:
        The scale factor from virtual coords to real coords.

      • getGLScreenVirtualBounds

        nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D getGLScreenVirtualBounds()
        Returns:
        The bounds of the full OpenGL rendering bounds in virtual coordinates, ignoring any offset or clipping.
